testimonials.author: Chinedu Okafor
testimonials.message: Ephraim is a rare talent. He delivered complex features ahead of schedule and brought clarity to our product direction.

testimonials.author: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.message: His attention to detail and commitment to performance optimization significantly improved our app stability.

testimonials.author: Michael Chen
testimonials.message: From architecture to pixel-perfect UI, Ephraim handled everything with excellence.
